name: Dnamic World
tagline: People you really want to work with.
description:
Dnamic World is a mobile and web development specialists, but more than that we are people you really want to work with! At DNAMIC we pride ourselves on being a tight-knit team of technologists with passion for new and creative user experiences.
We create visually stunning applications utilizing the latest cloud solutions and emerging technologies to keep you one step ahead of the competition.

locations.address: Ruta 108 / La Republica - San Fransisco, Goigochea
